xmodel.name: Financial Management
xmodel.description: Author: Sander van der Hoog, last modified: December, 2008

variable.name: debt_rescaling_factor
variable.description: The debt rescaling factor $\omega$ is used in case of a firm bankruptcy to rescale the debt. This is a process of debt-to-equity transformation. It sets the target debt level in relation to the value of total assets: $L^*=\omega A^*$. The firm will not refund all of its loans completely, but will write off every loan with a certain ratio: $w_j = (1-L^*/L)L_j$ for loan $j$. The fraction $(1-L^*/L)$ is the write-off ratio, and $w_j$ is the monetary amount of the write-off for loan $j$.

variable.name: target_leverage_ratio
variable.description: The target leverage ratio is the proportion of the target debt to target equity: $\ell = L^*/E^*$. This determines the target equity level as $E^*= (1/\ell) L^*$ and sets the amount of equity that the firm should raise on the financial market.

variable.name: target_liquidity_ratio
variable.description: The target liquidity ratio is a parameter used in the case of firm bankruptcy due to illiquidity. The amount of equity to raise on the AFM equals $\alpha (F-P)$, where $\alpha$ is the target liquidity ratio, F are the financial commitments, and P is the payment account.

variable.name: const_dividend_earnings_ratio
variable.description: The parameter const_dividend_earnings_ratio is used to determine the first positive dividend payment (if the dividend was set to 0, or at the start): TOTAL_DIVIDEND_PAYMENT = CONST_DIVIDEND_EARNINGS_RATIO *NET_EARNINGS;

variable.name: bank_id
variable.description: Bank providing the loan.

variable.name: loan_value
variable.description: Current value of the loan (initial value minus debt installments).

variable.name: interest_rate
variable.description: Fixed interest rate per month.

variable.name: installment_amount
variable.description: Fixed installment payment due per month.

variable.name: var_per_installment
variable.description: Value-at-risk subtracted from the residual value-at-risk at each installment.

variable.name: residual_var
variable.description: Residual value-at-risk, decreases gradually.

variable.name: bad_debt
variable.description: Bad debt that is not refunded to bank in case of a firm bankruptcy.

variable.name: nr_periods_before_repayment
variable.description: The number of periods left before full repayment of the loan is due.

variable.name: ebit
variable.description: Earnings-before-interest-and-taxes: total revenue - sales_costs

variable.name: earnings
variable.description: Earnings after interest payments (= ebit - interest)

variable.name: tax_rate_corporate
variable.description: Tax rate on corporate profits (kept in memory)

variable.name: tax_rate_vat
variable.description: VAT tax rate

variable.name: tax_payment
variable.description: Tax payment over earnings after interest payments (tax_corporate*earnings)

variable.name: net_earnings
variable.description: Net earnings after tax payments (= ebit - interest - tax)

variable.name: previous_net_earnings
variable.description: Net earnings from previous production period

variable.name: total_interest_payment
variable.description: Total interest payments on outstanding debts

variable.name: total_debt_installment_payment
variable.description: Total debt installment payments on outstanding debts

variable.name: total_dividend_payment
variable.description: Total dividend payment

variable.name: current_share_price
variable.description: Current share price on the market

variable.name: previous_dividend_per_share
variable.description: Dividend-per-share ratio (previous production cycle)

variable.name: current_dividend_per_share
variable.description: Dividend-per-share ratio

variable.name: previous_earnings_per_share
variable.description: Earnings-per-Share ratio (previous production cycle)

variable.name: current_earnings_per_share
variable.description: Earnings-per-Share ratio

variable.name: previous_dividend_per_earnings
variable.description: Dividend-to-Earnings ratio (previous production cycle)

variable.name: current_dividend_per_earnings
variable.description: Dividend-to-Earnings ratio

variable.name: debt_earnings_ratio
variable.description: Debt-to-Earnings ratio

variable.name: debt_equity_ratio
variable.description: Debt-to-Equity ratio

variable.name: price_earnings_ratio
variable.description: Price-to-Earnings ratio

variable.name: retained_earnings_ratio
variable.description: Retained earnings-to-Earnings ratio

variable.name: earnings_per_share_ratio_growth
variable.description: Target growth of the Earnings-per-Share ratio

variable.name: critical_price_earnings_ratio
variable.description: Critical (target) value for the Price-Earnings ratio (can be set by the firm)

variable.name: critical_earnings_per_share_ratio
variable.description: Critical (target) value for the Earnings-per-Share ratio (derived from the growth level)

variable.name: loans
variable.description: Array of structs holding all loans of the firm

variable.name: total_debt
variable.description: Total value of all loans outstanding

variable.name: total_value_local_inventory
variable.description: Total value of all local inventory stocks held at malls

variable.name: total_units_capital_stock
variable.description: Units of capital stock

variable.name: total_value_capital_stock
variable.description: Value of the capital stock

variable.name: total_capital_depreciation_value
variable.description: Sum over all units of capital of the depreciation value

variable.name: total_capital_depreciation_units
variable.description: Sum over all units of capital of the depreciation in units

variable.name: total_assets
variable.description: Value of total assets

variable.name: equity
variable.description: equity = total assets - total liabilities

variable.name: production_liquidity_needs
variable.description: Production liquidity needs are production costs (labour costs and investments)

variable.name: financial_liquidity_needs
variable.description: Financial liquidity needs are prior financial commitments (interests, installments, taxes)

variable.name: total_financial_needs
variable.description: Total financial needs = Production liquidity needs + Financial liquidity needs + dividends

variable.name: external_financial_needs
variable.description: External financing

variable.name: total_income
variable.description: Total monthly income (revenues, new bank loans, new share issues). Used for the balance sheet accounting.

function.name: Firm_compute_financial_payments
function.description: Function to compute the prior financial commitments of the firm: interests, installments, taxes.

function.name: Firm_compute_income_statement
function.description: Function to compute the income statement of the firm.

function.name: Firm_compute_dividends
function.description: Function to compute the total dividend payout of the firm.

function.name: Firm_compute_total_financial_payments
function.description: Function to compute the total financial payments of the firm: interest, installments, taxes, production costs, dividends.

function.name: Firm_compute_balance_sheet
function.description: Function to compute the balance sheet of the firm.

function.name: Firm_set_bankruptcy_insolvency
function.description: Function to set the type of bankruptcy to `insolvency' and go to end_Firm state. Also sets the active flag to 0 and starts the bankruptcy idle counter.

function.name: Firm_compute_total_liquidity_needs
function.description: Function to compute the total liquidity needs for executing payments.

function.name: Firm_compute_and_send_stock_orders
function.description: Function to send order_messages to the clearinghouse (share emission or repurchase).

function.name: Firm_read_stock_transactions
function.description: Function to read order_status messages from the clearinghouse, and update the firm's trading account.

function.name: Firm_check_financial_and_bankruptcy_state
function.description: Function that checks the balance sheet and sets flags for the bankruptcy- or financial crisis state.

function.name: Firm_set_bankruptcy_illiquidity
function.description: unction to set the type of bankruptcy to `illiquidity' and then go to end_Firm state. Also sets the active flag to 0 and starts the bankruptcy idle counter.

function.name: Firm_in_financial_crisis
function.description: Function to resolve the financial crisis by reducing dividends.

function.name: Firm_not_in_bankruptcy
function.description: Idle function to transit from state Firm_bankruptcy_checked to state Firm_checks_financial_crisis.

function.name: Firm_execute_financial_payments
function.description: Function to execute financial payments.

function.name: Firm_send_subsidy_notification
function.description: Function to send a subsidy_notification_message to the government.

function.name: Firm_send_transfer_notification
function.description: Function to send a transfer_notification_message to the government.

function.name: Firm_bankruptcy_insolvency_procedure
function.description: Function to process the bankruptcy condition in case of insolvency.

function.name: Firm_bankruptcy_illiquidity_procedure
function.description: Function to process the bankruptcy condition in case of illiquidity.

function.name: Firm_bankruptcy_idle_counter
function.description: Function to decrease the bankruptcy_idle_counter by 1. Note that a negative count means the financing condition has not been yet satisfied at the end of the default idle period.

function.name: Firm_compute_and_send_stock_orders
function.description: Function to send order_messages to the clearinghouse (new share emission).

function.name: Firm_read_stock_transactions
function.description: Function to read order_status messages from the clearinghouse, and update the firm's trading account.

function.name: Firm_reset_bankruptcy_flags
function.description: Function to reset the bankruptcy flags when the bankruptcy process has finished.

message.name: dividend_per_share
message.description: Added by firm to send msg to shareholders with dividends per share

message.name: bankruptcy_illiquidity
message.description: Bankruptcy msg send by firm to mall.

message.name: bankruptcy_insolvency
message.description: Bankruptcy msg send by firm to mall.
